original: intros x y Hx Hy. unfold corable in Hx, Hy. destruct Hx as [Hx _]. destruct Hy as [Hy _]. intros st Hsep. apply (deduction_andp_intro _ (x st) (y st)). - apply (deduction_andp_elim1 _ (Hx st)). apply (deduction_sepcon_elim1 _ _ _ _ Hsep). - apply (deduction_andp_elim2 _ (Hy st)). apply (deduction_sepcon_elim2 _ _ _ _ Hsep).
